sources.title: The Paneless Window Washer (1937)
sources.description: Bluto dirties all of an office building's windows himself, to drum up business for his window cleaning service. When he gets to Olive's stenographer office, about ten floors up, she says no: Popeye's going to wash her windows. And the battle with Popeye is on. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-paneless-window-washer-1937/

metadata.Plot: Bluto's window cleaning service is not above drumming up a little business for himself. But when he gets to Olive's stenographer office, about 10 floors up, she says no: Popeye's going to wash her windows. And the battle is on.
metadata.Actors: Jack Mercer, Mae Questel, Gus Wicke
